title: 2009 Eurovision Song Contest, Moscow, Russia
text:
2009 Eurovision Song Contest, Moscow, Russia
NOS quits Eurovision, Dutch participation goes on NOS quits Eurovision, Dutch participation goes on
Dutch broadcaster NOS announced that the 2009 Eurovision Song Contest in Moscow will be their very last participation. From 2010, they will no longer send a participant or broadcast ESC. The broadcaster taking over is TROS. They will participate for at least three years, starting in 2010.
